effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

short_effect.x-y: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.x-y: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
